title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Jul 24 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Wednesday, 24 July 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On this Wednesday, July 24 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex talks about the increasing frequency of police state violence as a cop kills a family dog in Virginia while delivering the tragic news that their son had been killed. Executing family pets is now routine behavior for many police departments around the country. 

Alex also looks at pro-Trayvon protests organized by a communist who idolizes the historical mass murderers Stalin and Mao as the effort to persecute George Zimmerman for exercising his right to self defense turns into a distorted and preverse "civil rights" campaign led by notorious ambulance chasers and other political opportunists. 

Alex runs down other important news items on today's worldwide broadcast, including an effort in Congress to take the air out of the NSA's surveillance grid and put a stop to the Stasi state.

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
